text:
Feroze Gandhi was an Indian freedom fighter, politician and journalist. He published the newspapers The National Herald and The Navjivan. He served as a member of the provincial parliament between 1950 and 1952, and later a member of the Lok Sabha, the Lower House of India's parliament. Wikipedia
Died: 8 September 1960, New Delhi
Parents: Faredoon Jehangir Ghandy, Ratimai Commissariat
